statements: UPDATE retargeting_campaigns SET status='Active' WHERE campaign_id=1001;
UPDATE retargeting_campaigns SET budget=1500.50, status='Inactive' WHERE campaign_name='Spring Sale Campaign';
UPDATE retargeting_campaigns SET budget = 5000.00, status = 'Active' WHERE campaign_id = 123;

UPDATE retargeting_campaigns SET campaign_name = 'New Campaign', start_date = '2023-01-01', end_date = '2023-12-31', targeting_criteria = 'High Engagement', budget = 7500.00, status = 'Completed' WHERE campaign_id = 456;
UPDATE customer_interaction_data SET interaction_type = 'Phone Call', interaction_details = 'Spoke with customer directly' WHERE customer_id = 12345;
UPDATE retargeting_campaigns SET target_audience = 'Previous website visitors' WHERE campaign_id = 67890;
UPDATE customer_interaction_data SET interaction_type = 'Complaint', interaction_details = 'Customer complained about delivery service' WHERE customer_id = 123;
UPDATE retargeting_campaigns SET target_audience = 'New Customers', campaign_start_date = '2022-06-01', campaign_end_date = '2022-08-31' WHERE campaign_id = 456;
UPDATE retargeting_campaigns SET start_date='2022-05-01', end_date='2022-06-30' WHERE campaign_id=1001;
UPDATE customer_interactions SET interaction_type='Email', interaction_date='2022-05-15' WHERE interaction_id=2005;
UPDATE retargeting_campaigns SET start_date = '2022-06-01', end_date = '2022-07-01' WHERE campaign_id = 101;
UPDATE campaign_interactions SET interaction_result = 'Success' WHERE campaign_id = 101 AND interaction_id = 201;
UPDATE customers SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE interactions SET interaction_type = 'Call' WHERE interaction_id = 3;
UPDATE customers SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 3;
UPDATE interactions SET interaction_date = '2022-01-15 14:30:00' WHERE customer_id = 5 AND interaction_type = 'purchase';
UPDATE interactions SET interaction_date = '2022-12-31', interaction_type = 'Meeting' WHERE interaction_id = 101;
UPDATE customers SET phone_number = '123-456-7890', email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 201;
UPDATE interactions SET interaction_date = '2022-07-15', interaction_type = 'Meeting' WHERE interaction_id = 1;
UPDATE campaign_interactions SET interaction_type = 'Email', interaction_date = '2022-08-20' WHERE campaign_id = 5 AND interaction_id = 3;
